I am Jordon Osborne the

I am a UI/UX Designer and Developer. I specialize in CSM such as SharePoint and WIX.

View My Work

I Specialize In

I specialize in Office 365 applications such as SharePoint, Power Automate, Power Apps, and Power BI. I also have a wide array of knowledge in other similar CSMs such as Caputech and WIX.

SharePoint

I manage a variety of internal websites for the company and know every version of SharePoint. (SharePoint 2010, 2013, and Online)

Caputech/Capuware

I have a wide array of knowledge in this space and have helped develop several custom HTML buttons to enhance user experience.

WIX

I have designed and maintained my local churches website for several years using the WIX platform.

HTML/CSS/JavaScript

I have a variety of web development skills, and am constantly expanding my knowledge.

My Design Process

My design process consist of enhancing existing designs to provide a superior user experience.

1

Discuss the Vision

Every client has there own style preferences, needs and wants. Which is why I like to discuss their vision and get a feel for their taste in web design based off other websites they have seen and used.

2

Brainstorm Enhancements

Once the client's style, needs, and wants are outlined I am able to determine the best path forward for them. Whether that means tweaking an existing design to fit his/her needs, or starting from scratch with a blank slate.

3

Create the Vision

When the creative vision is clear, I will work on developing the website and give the client an estimated completion date and price. For projects starting from scratch I create a design layout for approval prior to developing the code.

4

Finalize the Design

Finally I provide the finished project to the client and review any necessary changes prior to deploying to the web. I strive to release a bug free 100% satisfied client version upon launch.
